players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
You: "I agree with Charlie - Bob's death is concerning. We need to be very careful about who we trust. Does anyone have any information that might help us identify the mafioso?"
Diana: "Based on my investigation during the night, I have reason to believe that Alice is the mafioso. It would be in everyone's best interest if we vote her out tonight."
